document_data.name: Stronk
document_data.mainbody: '''Stronk''' was a [[fomorian]] living in the [[Wormwrithings]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationship: Stronk somehow formed a bond with the [[purple worm]]s.
document_data.Activities: Stronk acted as a caretaker for the eggs of purple worms in the area.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], he was killed by an expedition led by some [[adventurer]]s, who'd been hired by [[Bruenor Battlehammer]] to investigate the threat of the [[demon lord]]s, who were in need of a purple worm egg for a rite to banish the demon lords.
